title: Default Tanru Grouping
goal: Understand that three-word tanru group left-to-right by default.

sections.content:
Warm-up (2-3 min)

Tanru review:

blue dog → ?
fast run → ?
big red house → ?

(Answers: blanu gerku, sutra bajra, barda xunre zdani)

New Material (5-7 min)

New Vocabulary

Lojban Place Structure English
skari x1 is a color/hue of x2 as perceived by x3 color
tarmi x1 is the shape/form of x2 shape/form

Three-Word Tanru

When you have three words, how do they group?

Default rule: Left-to-right, first two group first.

a b c = (a b) c

The first two words form a unit, which then modifies the third.

Example: barda blanu gerku

barda blanu gerku = (barda blanu) gerku

Reading: (big-blue) dog

Meaning: A dog that is big-blue (both big and blue together as a combined property).

More Examples

sutra bajra prenu = (sutra bajra) prenu

(fast-running) person — a person who is a fast-runner.

cmalu xunre mlatu = (cmalu xunre) mlatu

(small-red) cat — a cat that is small-red.

Visualizing the Grouping

      gerku
       /
   (barda blanu)
    /       \
 barda    blanu

The compound barda blanu acts as a single modifier for gerku.

Key Point

In a b c, the first two words (a b) combine first, then modify c.
sections.title: New Material (5-7 min)

sections.content:
Practice (4-5 min)

Exercise 1: Identify Grouping

How do these group by default?

  1. clani blabi karce = ?
  2. sutra klama prenu = ?
  3. xamgu citka mlatu = ?
Answers
  1. (clani blabi) karce — (long-white) car
  2. (sutra klama) prenu — (fast-going) person
  3. (xamgu citka) mlatu — (good-eating) cat

Exercise 2: Create Three-Word Tanru

Form tanru:

  1. (big-blue) house → ?
  2. (fast-running) dog → ?
  3. (small-red) apple → ?
Answers
  1. barda blanu zdani
  2. sutra bajra gerku
  3. cmalu xunre plise

Exercise 3: Use New Vocabulary

Translate:

  1. This is a color.
  2. The shape is big.
  3. I see the red color.
Answers
  1. ti skari
  2. la tarmi cu barda
  3. mi viska la xunre skari

Conversation Challenge (1-2 min)

Say aloud:

  1. "This is a big blue dog." → ti barda blanu gerku
  2. "I am a fast runner." → mi sutra bajra prenu
  3. "The color is green." → la skari cu crino

Today's Vocab

Lojban Place Structure English
skari x1 is a color of x2 perceived by x3 color
tarmi x1 is the shape/form of x2 shape/form

items.place: x1 is a color of x2 perceived by x3
x1 is the shape/form of x2

Summary

You learned that three-word tanru group left-to-right by default: a b c = (a b) c. The first two words combine, then modify the third.
